definitions.text: go into retirement; stop performing one's work or withdraw from one's position
pull back or move away or backward
examples: The limo pulled away from the curb

definitions.text: withdraw from circulation or from the market, as of bills, shares, and bonds
break from a meeting or gathering
examples: The men retired to the library
The director was retired after the scandal

definitions.text: dispose of (something no longer useful or needed)
examples: She finally retired that old coat
he retired from life when his wife died

definitions.text: cause to be out on a fielding play

examples: the runner was put out at third base
I usually turn in at midnight
He goes to bed at the crack of dawn
